title: How long will it be before you switch to a 5G phone? - Quora

response.answer_text: At the beginning of the year, my plan was to see the lineup of 5G phones available prior to the release of the new iPhone. Then at that point, I would have decided on which device to choose and probably bought a new phone in a few weeks[1]. Well a lot has changed since the beginning of the year. Since my wife lost her job just before the initial stay at home orders in March[2], buying a 5G device hasn't been on my priority list. For the most part it's been taking care of the family while also ensuring everyone is safe and healthy. I usually keep smartphones around 4 years and don't buy new devices unless we're dealing with hardware failures too expensive to repair. If things go as planned in my head, I'm suspecting some time mid 2021 when I'll make the switch to a 5G device. We'll have a better idea by then how well 5G devices will perform on this new network. Footnotes[1] Jahmal Abbott's answer to What new and/or upcoming technology do you plan on purchasing in 2020?[2] The Jahmal Abbott Show: Maintaining Hope During a Crisis

Got them in April. I had pretty much totaled my phone when a good offer on new phones came up. My area has decent service with 5g. I use one for a dedicated hot spot for home. Working well. Local cable internet service is near extortion $$$
